channel.title: [317 | Delta] I need help with a few things please [QUICK]
channel.description:
I'm almost done with my server but I have a few things left.
1. Which pieces of code are for editing XP given
2. How do i make an item give infinate or high Hp's. Again if you could show an example and tell me which file to edit.
3. How do I add a Town Crier so he yells and when people click him they can click an option like Rules, Commands, More and it will open an interface

item.title: [317 | Delta] I need help with a few things please [QUICK]
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

for #1 search in client.java

addskillxp

all of those add xp to the level in its line of the code

Read full topic
